markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dual-Weapon Blitz](/Feats.aspx?ID=6311) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 196 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247)

**Prerequisites**
[Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6307)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two one handed melee weapons, each in a different hand.

</column>

---

You attack as you weave your way around the battlefield. Stride up to your Speed. During this movement, you can Strike once with each of the two one-handed melee weapons. Each of these Strikes can be made at any point during your movement.
name: Dual-Weapon Blitz
requirement: You are wielding two one handed melee weapons, each in a different hand.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding two one handed melee weapons, each in a different hand.
